body:
Hey guys, I am just wondering for some opinions of recourse packs because I have been using CreepyCraft for a long time now and I just want to know some good packs 



pls help

-KingR10
body_tagged:

title: Resource Pack

replies.body: Take a look at mine bruh
replies.body_tagged: Take a look at mine bruh

replies.body: A pack isn't necessarily good or bad. What makes it that way is your preferences. If you like a certain type of sword or particle or block (etc) then find a pack that fits all your needs. If you really wanna look at packs, just simply go search "Minecraft PvP resource packs" in YouTube or something. Keep on searching :)
replies.body_tagged: A pack isn't necessarily good or bad. What makes it that way is your preferences. If you like a certain type of sword or particle or block (etc) then find a pack that fits all your needs. If you really wanna look at packs, just simply go search "Minecraft PvP resource packs" in YouTube or something. Keep on searching :)

replies.body:
Or you could make your own resource pack. Download WinRar and combine the textures you want from every texture pack.

It takes a fair amount of time, but you will grow into searching the best textures =)

PS: Target a specific texture to find and search that on Youtube and you will find something good, or maybe even multiple things!
